biotools.summary: Corrects genome-wide siRNA screens for seed mediated off-target effect. Suitable functions to identify the effective seeds/miRNAs and to visualize their effect are also provided in the package.

bioschemas.name: scsR
bioschemas.summary: Corrects genome-wide siRNA screens for seed mediated off-target effect. Suitable functions to identify the effective seeds/miRNAs and to visualize their effect are also provided in the package.
